content: We must justify our actions against Purple's fascist ideology and build support for our cause.
Orange condemns Purple's aggressive territorial ambitions and violation of its sovereignty.
Propose a comprehensive trade agreement to boost economic development and foster cooperation.
Condemn Orange's actions and violation of sovereignty. Call for international support and solidarity.
Condemn Orange's aggressive actions and violation of sovereignty, calling for international condemnation and support.
Orange condemns Purple's aggressive actions and violation of its sovereignty. Orange calls on Purple to cease its aggression and return to peaceful means.
